name: Scared To Death (Noble Games)
description:
Scared To Death is a first-person horror game where you try to not get "scared to death" (while also trying to get to McDonald's). To feel safer, you need to use your flashlight, but this comes at a cost. The longer your flashlight is on, the less battery it has. Can you beat the odds and get to McDonald's, or will you get too scared?

Controls

Move : WASD, Arrow Keys

Flashlight : Left Click, F

Respawn : Space

Menu : M

Note:

Sorry, but I couldn't get a Mac build of the game. Also, the HTML5 build has a weird sound delay issue, but if you download the game it won't happen. The source code is available here under the GPL3.0 license.
